@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Updates a data row. The rowInfo map contains the following properties:

  • rowData (var): contains the row data for the row. The kind of this object depends on the table model, see {@link ITableModel#getRowData()}
  • row (int): the model index of the row.
  • selected (boolean): whether a cell in this row is selected.
  • focusedRow (boolean): whether the focused cell is in this row.
  • table (qx.ui.table.Table): the table the row belongs to.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
rowInfo {Map} A map containing the information about the row to
      update.
@param.description:
A map containing the information about the row to
      update.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowElement {Element} the DOM element that renders the data row.
@param.description: the DOM element that renders the data row.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the row's height CSS style taking the box model into account

@param.name: @param
@param.body: height {Integer} The row's (border-box) height in pixel

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Create a style string, which will be set as the style property of the row.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
rowInfo {Map} A map containing the information about the row to
      update. See {@link #updateDataRowElement} for more information.
@param.description:
A map containing the information about the row to
      update. See {@link #updateDataRowElement} for more information.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Create a HTML class string, which will be set as the class property of the row.
